noInternet.some: Some of the features will not work as expected in your Hexa app, including:

login.tos_agree: By proceeding to the next step, you agree to our

loaderMessages.heading: Savings Account
loaderMessages.text: The Savings Account unlocks once your backup is at Level 2. Also, setup your 2FA code on an authenticator app

loaderMessages.heading: Non-custodial buys
loaderMessages.text: Get sats directly in your wallet from compatible exchanges

loaderMessages.heading: Friends & Family
loaderMessages.text: Add contacts to Hexa and send sats w/o asking for their wallet address every time

loaderMessages.heading: Donation Accounts
loaderMessages.text: Start receiving donations directly in your Hexa Wallet, from anywhere in the world

loaderMessages.heading: Satoshis or Sats
loaderMessages.subText: Hexa uses sats to make using bitcoin easier

home.rampSub: Low fee for those big buys
home.manyWays: Many ways to stack sats directly in Hexa
home.rampMessage:
Ramp enables BTC purchases using Apple Pay, Debit/Credit card, Bank Transfer and open banking where available. Payment methods available may vary based on your country.

By proceeding, you understand that Ramp will process the payment and transfer for the purchased bitcoin.
home.rampProcessed: Your order is being processed by Ramp, once successful the purchased bitcoin will be transferred to your Ramp account
home.rampPaymentFail: Ramp was not able to process your payment. Please try after sometime or use a different payment method
home.wyreMessage:
Wyre enables BTC purchases using Apple Pay, debit card, bank transfer as well as easy transfers using open banking where available. Payment methods available may vary based on your country. 

By proceeding, you understand that Wyre will process the payment and transfer for the purchased bitcoin.
home.wyreProcessed: Your order is successful, the purchased bitcoin will be transferred to your Wyre account shortly
home.wyrePaymentFail: Wyre was not able to process your payment. Please try after sometime or use a different payment method

settings.nodeSub: Connect Hexa wallet to your own node
settings.AppInfoSub: Hexa app version number and details

header.incomplete: Cloud backup incomplete, please complete Level 1

stackTitle.ShowAllAccountsSub: Include Hidden and Archived accounts in your display

accManagement.Rearrange: Rearrange, archive and reinstate accounts from here

f&f.addressbook: You can choose from your phone's address book
f&f.appear:
Your contacts appear here when
added to Hexa wallet
f&f.Select: Select a contact from your phone's address book
f&f.why:
Why do we need access
to your address book?
f&f.info:
If you want to associate an address book contact with your Friends & Family in Hexa, you will need to give access to your address book 


It is a good way to remember who the contacts are with their name and image
f&f.otherText: We neither store this data nor pass it to anyone else. This is for your convenience only
f&f.optionally: You can optionally add a second factor when you are sending the link/ QR through an unencrypted channel
f&f.number: Your contact will have to verify their phone number {0} to accept the request
f&f.email: Your contact will have to verify their email {0} to accept the request
f&f.otp: Your contact will have to confirm the OTP ${0} to accept the request
f&f.select1: Select one of the below to add as a second factor to your link/QR
f&f.subText: An alphanumeric code will be generated
f&f.infoText: If the communication channel is not encrypted / secure, the second factor sent through a different channel improves the security guarantees
f&f.detailsOf: The details of your contact will appear here.
f&f.sure: Are you sure about removing the contact?
f&f.Removefrom: Remove the contact from Friends & Family
